settings.collapse_text: 99% cotton, 1% EL Our fabric is sourced locally in Napoli, Italy, from one of the world’s largest fabric distributors. They have over 20,000,000 yards of denim in stock from dozens of countries worldwide at any given time, and have been the primary provider to some of Italy’s premier fashion houses for almost 100 years.

A family run, multi generation fashion house located in the heart of the denim capital of Italy. Artisans who have been with the company for decades handcraft every pair with a level of expertise and genius second to none. A smaller operation than the majority of factories we have considered, you can feel the love, care, and passion in every stitch, and find Father, Son, Daughter, Mother, cousins, and even grandmother at the facility running the show every day.

For a flat rate of $5 we ship internationally to over 100 countries from our distribution centre in the Netherlands. We are currently in the process of expanding our fulfillment centre locations to speed up the process, but as of right now expect approximately 2-4 days in Europe, and 5-7 days to the rest of the world. You will be provided shipping information as soon as your package is dispatched.
See Returns Policy Page - TLDR: If there's a problem we will help you resolve it.

settings.collapse_text:
slø and One Tribe are working together to protect rainforest with every purchase you make. Now when you purchase from slø you automatically save trees in the rainforest and help improve the carbon footprint of your purchase.

slø is participating in the United Nations Framework for Climate Change to adopt the UN Sustainability Goals. Working together as one tribe to help fight climate change together.

We protected more than 1,119,975 trees with your help!

Learn more about our sustainability pledge

We are a constantly evolving project, and we like to be completely transparent about that. We spend a ridiculous amount of time, energy, and money on research and development and with that comes split second decisions and changes. We are constantly trying to improve and develop the product, so you may see minor changes between product photography and the final product. Now, they won’t end up being pink instead of blue, but a button, zipper, tag, or cut may end up with minor adjustments if our designers feel its an upgrade! We will always let you know via e-mail if anything changes, and we like to be completely transparent about our improvements.

settings.image1_caption: Our most requested feature! Pull your jeans in, or out approx. 2 inches with the side snaps.
settings.image2_caption: Built with a heavy duty gusset built to provide a better fit, feel, and lifespan
settings.image3_caption: We promised you the greatest pockets in the history of the universe, we delivered.
settings.image4_caption: Designed to prevent gaping, and keep your belt firmly in place.
settings.image5_caption: The key to the perfect fit, our outer gussets are reinventing the traditional waistband, allowing for a contoured fit
settings.image6_caption: All of our rivets, buttons, zippers, and snaps are allergen free and sourced responsibly in Los Angeles.

settings.heading: we created slø because we care

settings.text: Built on the suggestions of over 700,000 humans from around the world, and the crown jewel of the #pocketrevolution, 22,000,000 views, 5,500,000 likes, 500,000 comments, and 700,000 followers later, the “Tik-Tok” jeans are finally here. It’s not skinny, but it’s not straight, a functional, all-encompassing cut powered by our sizeYOU sizing system. Handcrafted in Italy using BCI-certified cotton, these jeans are the grooviest pants on planet Earth, made specifically for you, and ready to take the world by storm.

settings.heading: our fabric
settings.description: Our BCI certified fabric is 99% Cotton, but that doesn’t change the fact that it's gloriously stretchy. Designed to last a lifetime because longevity = sustainability

settings.heading: dying process
settings.description: We're very fortunate to be working with one of the most well respected laundry and dye house in Italy. they use the top of the line washing machinery to reduce water waste by up to 90%.

settings.heading: cut & sew
settings.description: A family run, multi generation fashion house located in the heart of the denim capital of Italy. You can feel the love, care, and passion in every stitch.

settings.heading: shipping
settings.description: slø is a plastic free company, we strictly use biodegradable packaging, and do not wrap our jeans in any sort of plastic.

settings.title: what is slow fashion?
settings.body:
The antithesis of fast fashion of course! Fast Fashion is the concept of mass-producing cheap and trendy clothing with weekly releases all year, resulting is massive stockpiles o waste that end up in landfills or incinerated, directly dumping carbon into the atmosphere. Fast fashion companies sell their clothing at such a low cost they often use materials unfit for clothing and use facilities with zero regard for human cost by extremely low cost or slave labor.

Slow fashion is different, we don’t mass produce in 52 season cycles. We operate with a zero waste model by only producing the clothes you order. We focus on staple clothing, timeless styles not cheap trends that go out of style in a few months. We only use materials that are grown, milled, and produced sustainably, including the ethical treatment of factory workers.

settings.title: do you do returns?
settings.body:
We’re all humans and we’ve got your back! Our customer service team will work with you on a case by case basis in order to figure out how we can provide you the best possible customer service and come to a resolution! 

Returns & Exchanges are one of the least sustainable parts of e-commerce, which is why we’ve invested so heavily in our sizing technology, the quality of the product, and our design. We are confident we will get you a fantastic fit and that you will love the product.

Please see the return policy.

settings.title: are there other cuts?
settings.body:
this is our soft launch, essentially our trial run to ensure we can keep up with demand and ensure our supply chain is functioning at max capacity.

With that being said more cuts, colors, and rise options will be available in our next launch! So if this isn't your style we will have some different options

settings.title: how stretchy are they?
settings.body: a glorious, buttery, 44% stretch with a dense but light 10.5oz fabric that hold's it's shape beautifully.

settings.title: how do I get sized?
settings.body: Head over to our sizing page to watch Zeena show you how to take your own measurements, take a friends measurements, and use our sizing software, 3D Look to get those measurements. Click here for the sizing page.

settings.title: why Italy?
settings.body:
Not only are our jeans made from sustainable materials, but we travelled all over the world to hand select the most ethical manufacturer we could find to produce them. We take a firm stance on not sacrificing an ounce of our ethics here.

We landed on a family owned and operated facility in Napoli, and when we say operated we don’t mean the family members sit in an office, the dad runs the business, the son is the pattern maker, daughter is the stylist/designer, and grandma manages the sewing team. Our jeans will be touched by every member of the family. They treat all of their employees like family because a lot their employees are also family! We’ll introduce you to them really soon

settings.title: what is sizeYOU?
settings.body: our proprietary sizing system powered by tens of thousands of data points, our size system its built to fit YOU, because thats what clothes should do! We are starting with over 100 size variations in V1, and will continue to scale as we add, learn, and develop new ways to size.

settings.title: will they shrink?
settings.body: The fabric is preshrunk and washed extensively prior to delivery, however to extend the lifespan of the product we highly reccomend washing on cold and air drying, you will get years of added lifespan out of your denim
